Input.name: onLoad
Input.tooltip: Signal sent when Diagram is loaded.

Input.name: onStart
Input.tooltip: Box behavior starts when a signal is received on this Input.

Input.name: onStop
Input.tooltip: Box behavior stops when a signal is received on this Input.

Output.name: onStopped
Output.tooltip: Signal sent when Box behavior is finished.

Parameter.name: Begin position (s)
Parameter.tooltip: Position in seconds where the playing must start.

Parameter.name: Volume (%)
Parameter.tooltip: Volume the file is played with.

Parameter.name: Panorama
Parameter.tooltip: Value which determines if the sound is played more on NAO's left or right. You can particularly set it to: - -1 to play only on the left loudspeaker. - 0 to play on both loudspeakers. - 1 to play only on the right loudspeaker.

Parameter.name: Play in loop
Parameter.tooltip: This parameter allows to play the file in loop. The playing will start each time at the beginning of the file.
